turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule a check-up with a general physician. Preferably someone in network with UnitedHealthcare.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that. To start, can you provide your name and date of birth? I'll also need your insurance member ID to confirm in-network providers.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, okay. Fine. My name is Sarah Miller and my birthday is 03/15/1988. My member ID is UHC1234567890. Why do I have to give you all this information? Can't you just look me up?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the inconvenience, Sarah. For security and privacy reasons, we require verification of your identity before accessing your protected health information. I have found several in-network physicians in your area. However, I cannot guarantee the accuracy of those providers' availability. Would you like me to list some and their current appointment slots?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, please. But, I work full-time and need appointments after 5 pm, or on weekends. Do any of them offer those times? Also, what if I need to see a specialist later on? Can you help me find one then?
